page.title: 16Marchwood Community School
page.content: The entrance was like a greenhouse.It's red,yellow and blue but part of the red has gone orange where the metal is deteriorating so this part has to be knocked down and rebuilt. It has a library,hall,craftroom,drama,needle work,cooking,staffroom,nursing room,headmasters office,classrooms and toilets.The hall is double glazed.It has a fan and good P.E. equipment.The drama room can be blacked out.The lighting was good and I liked the shaped windows. There's a spiral staircase leading to a classroom and a balcony.Children are visible from all parts of the school.Art and craft area are outside the classrooms.The building is unusual and full of character.
